personal_info.name: Navami Vipith Kumar
personal_info.title: Data Science Student
personal_info.summary/objective: A diligent and detail-oriented fifth year student of Data Science at Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham with strong leadership and technical skills. Actively seeking internships to leverage AI, machine learning, and predictive analysis for assisting companies in making informed business decisions.

education.institution: GEMS Our Own English High School, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
education.degree: All India Senior School Certificate Examination (Class 12)

education.institution: GEMS Our Own English High School, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
education.degree: All India Senior School Certificate Examination (Class 10)

projects.name: Medical RAG Application
projects.description: Developed a medical RAG app capable of processing and converting medical PDFs into vector representations. Enabled users to query the system and receive accurate, context-aware answers.

projects.name: Comprehensive Analysis of Historical Indian Corporate Data
projects.description: Performed extensive analysis on a comprehensive dataset encompassing all Indian companies recorded from 1857 to 2020. Utilized EDA techniques, statistical methods, and machine learning algorithms to derive insights and predictive models.

projects.name: Plagiarism Detection System
projects.description: Developed a plagiarism detection system using BERT and Doc2Vec, trained on research paper abstracts from 100,000 arXiv publications. Enhanced text similarity analysis for academic content.

certifications.name: Natural Language Processing with Sequence Models

extra_curriculars.name: Google Developer Student Clubs
extra_curriculars.description: Contributed to planning, organizing, and executing Google-sponsored Computer Science events.

extra_curriculars.name: Anokha 2023
extra_curriculars.description: Led the Communications team for Anokha ’23, Amrita University’s national level techfest.

extra_curriculars.name: Student Energy Amrita
extra_curriculars.description: Led the Editorial team, producing high-quality content and assisting in event organization.
